string.value: The poor girl standing outside the mansion looks so frightened and alone. Let's see what she needs help with.
Olivia will not return inside to the Mansion until the #b100 Dead Scarecrows#k are defeated.
The #b100 Dead Scarecrows#k have been defeated. Olivia is now able to enter her home, but this might just be the beginning.

I just went outside to play, trying to catch some pretty butterflies, when suddenly some horrible-looking zombies and ghosts snuck into our house. Now my daddy's trapped inside and I can't go back because these monsters are guarding the gate! Please help me return to my family!
You will? Thank you so much! Now, if you could defeat #b100 Dead Scarecrows#k then I might just be willing to take a step in there. I believe in you!
What...? You're going to abandon this scared, lonely little girl? You have no heart!
Can you rid the house of zombies and ghosts? I'm afraid to go inside alone.
Oh, I'm so grateful to you. For a minute, I thought you'd never return. I hope Daddy and my doll collection are still intact.
I don't think I can go back inside yet. I still see those #b100 Dead Scarecrows#k lurking around the corner.
